attributes.action: Build a Hall of Residence for MPs in close proximity to the Houses of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop MPs abusing the allowances for second homes, instead provide them with a hall of residence.  It should be comfortable, but not excessively so, and fitted to a reasonable standard.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
